com.worxforus.json

Class JSONObjectWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.worxforus.json.JSONObjectWrapper

  • public class JSONObjectWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to wrap any JSON calls - this way when a faster implementation is to be used, we can just connect it here without refactoring the entire project in these three files: JSONArrayWrapper.java JSONExceptionWrapper.java JSONObjectWrapper.java
    Author:
    sbossen
